metadata.description: Inventory - Determines if you want to only update objects that have changed, or all objects. Defaults to No. Switching to Yes will cause the flows to inventory every single app/flow/etc in the tenant and make the flows long running
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/
in the maker table we store a user for system with an id. Storing here so that it can be referenced without having to look it up all the time.

parameters.$select: admin_portalid, admin_portaluniquename, admin_portalwebsiteid, admin_portaldisplayname, admin_portalwebsitename, statecode
admin_portalid, admin_portaluniquename, admin_portalwebsiteid, admin_portaldisplayname, admin_portalwebsitename, admin_portalmodifiedon

Auth_Local_Authentication_Enabled.description: if filter returned no rows, default to true, else get value

Auth_Open_Registration_Enabled.description: if filter returned no rows, default to true, else get value

Auth_Local_Registration_Enabled.description: if filter returned no rows, default to true, else get value

Auth_Invitation_Enabled.description: if filter returned no rows, default to true, else get value

Auth_External_Identities_Enabled.description: if filter returned no rows, default to true, else get value

Entity_List_Table_Permission_Enabled_Val.description: If Returned entity list count <=0 then table permissions enabled = true. Else  table permissions =false.

Basic_Form_Table_Permission_Enabled_Valu.description: If Returned entity list count <=0 then table permissions enabled = true. Else  table permissions =false.

OwnerID.inputs: @if(equals(body('Get_Owner')?['azureactivedirectoryobjectid'], null), if(equals(body('Get_Owner')?['fullname'], 'SYSTEM'), parameters('CoE System User ID (admin_CoESystemUserID)'), ''), body('Get_Owner')?['azureactivedirectoryobjectid'])

IsOrphan.inputs: @if(or(equals(outputs('OwnerID'), null), equals(length(outputs('OwnerID')), 0), equals(outputs('Get_Maker')?['body/admin_makerisorphaned'], true), equals(outputs('Get_Maker')?['body/admin_makerid'], null)), true, false)

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date

Initialize_variable_AdvancedFormStepHasT.description: initialize to true meaning all steps have table permissions enabled
